website_summaries.verdict: While the warm sensation is potentially relaxing for many consumers, the downside is the strange aroma and its limitations.
pros: Produces a soothing, warm sensation that many users find relaxing
Lightweight and comfortable on the face
cons: Numerous gripes of the scent being unpleasant, harsh, and/or too strong
Doesn't stay warm long enough to suit all users

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: Haha, for the people who think that the steam comes off the sheets you guys are funny. This acts as a heat pad (the ones you use for winter to warm your hands and then throw away once your done) they work like that. This take the stress out of you eyes and calms you down with this nice heat that doesnt get to hot! and the smell is amazin! I highly recommend! My gf loves it and puts it of after her face mask routine! THIS IS THE BEST
customer_reviews.author: ♡ Makoto Busby ♡

customer_reviews.title: BEST STEAM EYE MASK!
customer_reviews.text: THE BEST! Heavenly little treat for relaxing! I’ve tried so many steam masks and these are my favorite by FAR! Great for right before bed, in the bath, airplane/bus trips, any time you want to relax. Makes a great gift too!
customer_reviews.author: arretederaler

customer_reviews.title: So Relaxing!
customer_reviews.text: I adore these. I got them to use during a long international flight. Haven't used them on a plane yet, but I tried a few at home and felt so relaxed. Will purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: AshleyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Warm. Relaxing!
customer_reviews.text: They put me to sleep in 10 mins! Very addicted-))))) They smell nice!
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Relaxing and warm. Helps me fall asleep
customer_reviews.text: I love these masks. A warm heat with pleasant lavender smell helps my eyes to relax and helps me fall asleep. Excellent for meditation as well. Heat lasts about 15-20 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Aungie

customer_reviews.title: I love the ease of these eye masks
customer_reviews.text: I love the ease of these eye masks. They smell so pleasant and it really helps me rest at night. I like that they are light weight and don’t bother me at night while I sleep. I wish they stayed warmer for longer. But I love the convince to take on trips. So happy to have a source to get these in the states.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Love my eye mask domo arigato gozaimashita 🙏
customer_reviews.text: I love this product I used this for a long time seens i was in japan Very relaxing after a very busy day of work After Japanese ofuro and go to bed I feel I’m in heaven so relaxing makes you sleep good 😘❤️🙏👍👍👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Mallari

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it. Misleading. It only came with 12 masks, not 14 masks.
customer_reviews.text: Misleading, it only came with 12 masks and I looked at their reviews just now. It seems like that how they do it.
customer_reviews.author: Jie Yu

customer_reviews.title: Only 12 sheets in the box!
customer_reviews.text: Buyers be aware! I order a 14 sheets box, and the box I received has only 12 sheets!
customer_reviews.author: Momof3

customer_reviews.title: sleep good
customer_reviews.text: i used this warm eye masks when i go to bed, it helps me sleep faster. the warmth makes my eyes very relaxed and the rose smells good, my whole family is using it.
customer_reviews.author: sjiamxx

customer_reviews.title: Super relaxing
customer_reviews.text: The smell is really nice and it makes you feel like you are at a spa!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What can’t the Japanese do?
customer_reviews.text: These things feel amazing! After a long day of reading case briefs these warm blankets of steamy joy revive my tired eyes. There really is warm steam so don’t try these with mascara on.
customer_reviews.author: dana

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling!
customer_reviews.text: These are very similar to the ones I had purchased while traveling in Japan. Great for flights, smell lovely and not too warm!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible!
customer_reviews.text: Different from the one I bought in Japan. The smell is not good.
customer_reviews.author: arkoe

customer_reviews.title: Liar
customer_reviews.text: So I bought a box of 14 pc masks, it just delivered today and it was a box of 12 pc masks. I don’t know how this happened.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Why did it came with a pack of 12 instead of 14
customer_reviews.text: I love this products, but why did it came with a pack of 12 not 14 ?? So I would buy from a different place next time.
customer_reviews.author: tian

customer_reviews.title: It’s not warm at all ...
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know but my masks don’t warm :( I open one by one but it not warm anyway :/ I’m sad .
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Coelho

customer_reviews.title: Not as the same as I bought in Japan. DON'T BUY
customer_reviews.text: No steam, smell so strong and definitely not lavender, the temperature too high. This product is not like what I bought in Japan at all. DO NOT BUY THIS
customer_reviews.author: NatNat

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect amount of sheets
customer_reviews.text: I receive this product yesterday but only receive 12 sheets. It was suppose to be 14.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Good products
customer_reviews.text: I like using those before going to bed. They relax my eyes and my mind.
customer_reviews.author: ting sun

customer_reviews.title: Soothing Product for the Eyes
customer_reviews.text: provided the comfort that I was looking for - nice light fragrance
customer_reviews.author: Joe Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: The scent might have been too much, but it’s still a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Love these eye masks
customer_reviews.text: These eye masks are just perfect. They smell so nice, and they're so comfortable to wear. I put them on just before bed and they actually help me fall asleep. When you open the pouch that they're in, the air activates the heating inside the eye mask so no shaking squeezing twisting or microwaving needed. Just open them up, slip the loops over your ears and warmth begins. I did not find the heat to be uncomfortable, in fact, I found it soothing. The scent was not too overpowering. I'll definitely be getting more of these as they're becoming a weekly ritual for me!
customer_reviews.author: D. Aurora

customer_reviews.title: Super strong scent
customer_reviews.text: I usually am okay with lavender scent, but this blend is super strong that it bothered me so much I felt better off without the mask on. I was able to smell the chamomile version and it's much more relaxing and less offensively strong. Over all a good product, but I will definitely buy the chamomile from now on.
customer_reviews.author: JuneClover

customer_reviews.title: Would definately reorder!
customer_reviews.text: PROS: Heats up gradually but quickly Holds great temperature Material is soft CONS: For a person who gets migraines, the smell if the lavender is a bit strong but I choose lavender. If I reorder, will definately find one without any smells. Other than that, it is an amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: If you can afford it, they're absolutely lovely
customer_reviews.text: I only wish more came in the box since I love using them. Don't put an old one in the microwave! Yep, that turned out not well at all.
customer_reviews.author: Eieiom

customer_reviews.title: A frequent flyer companion!
customer_reviews.text: If you have a hard time sleeping on planes this so the product for you. At the very least it relaxes you and provides a bit of much needed moisture on long flights. They are individually sealed and compact so they fit easily into any handbag. They are quite comfortable to wear and the scent is pleasant. This is my must have when I travel!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Fearon

customer_reviews.title: Heaven, omg
customer_reviews.text: Really wonderful for stress. Just so nice at the end of a day when you're having a hard time unwinding.
customer_reviews.author: Osigalas

customer_reviews.title: Good product but terrible smell
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to use and comfortable. The heat doesn’t last that long and the scented smell is so terrible that I can’t even keep the eye mask on that long.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Great for sinus headache
customer_reviews.text: These are great for a sinus headache or to open up sinuses.
customer_reviews.author: L. K. Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Great for travelIng!
customer_reviews.text: So relaxing, great to take on a plane and on trips when you might have trouble sleeping at various hotels!
customer_reviews.author: Starjolie

customer_reviews.title: Literally addicted
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loveeeeee this product. If you already sleep well on your own, then dont get these. These things will make u addicted because of how good they feel on hour eyes. I used it my first time over a month ago and I've been dying to buy them again. I sleep good on my own but after this, I feel like I need to buy more. So only buy these if you really need it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle

customer_reviews.title: If you have headaches & trouble sleeping these will definitely help relax you !!!
customer_reviews.text: First time I tried these was on an 18 hour flight with a blasting headache ... it worked wonders !!!! The smell of lavender was not overwhelming (I am sensitive to strong smells) I use them when I have a headache and can’t sleep the warmth just helps you relax I have recommended them to friends and family & they also love them !
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I use those all the time. when my eyes hurt, I wear it at night time, it helps me go sleep very well. love it.
customer_reviews.author: August

customer_reviews.title: Lived by these when I was in Japan.
customer_reviews.text: These things are amazing although it hurts my soul to see the price. In japan I could by the same box for 6 US dollars. (and Japan isn't an inexpensive country) REMEMBER NOT TO FALL ASLEEP WITH THEM ON!!! they could possible burn your eyelids without you realizing until the morning
customer_reviews.author: AngelaC.

customer_reviews.title: Even my cat likes them!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Agree with all the fab reviews. Did a little research and they are carbon oxygen activated and safe. Great for insomniacs - they put you right to sleep. One interesting thing though, my cat is obsessed with them!!!! Is there cat nip in these? He’s usually very gentle but when I’m using them he runs over and it’s sniff-fest on my face! It’s pretty funny but then he wants to lick them and tear them open! I have to be careful where I leave them. Anyone else had this experience? Bc ingredients are in Japanese I’m just not sure what it is.
customer_reviews.author: NoreeTav

customer_reviews.title: This mask is very convenient my flight!
customer_reviews.text: I always bring these masks for my trip and long flight. They have many fragrance choices in Japan but I'm not sure if you can buy various kinds of Kao products here. I usually get these in Mitsuwa or Marukai in California. Anyway I really recommend these mask if you want to heal your tired eyes and you can also feel very relaxed anywhere. It will be your small reward for your hard work at the end of the day (⌒∇⌒)
customer_reviews.author: Piglet

customer_reviews.title: Rose smelling eye masks
customer_reviews.text: These rose 🌹 smelling eye masks put me To sleep in 5 minutes. The smell is very subtle and relaxing.
customer_reviews.author: corpexcel

customer_reviews.title: Eyes well rested
customer_reviews.text: I love these! One use and my eyes feel like I had 8 hours of sleep. I work at my local hospital and use them after a long grueling day.
customer_reviews.author: Fionnah

customer_reviews.title: So soothing
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been having trouble falling asleep and staying asleep for the night. My friend got me these for my birthday and I fall asleep in minutes! It is so soothing. The small is nice and it’s not too hot. It feels so luxurious and calming. I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Sam

product_meta.title: Kao MEGURISM Health Care Steam Warm Eye Mask,Made in Japan, Lavender Sage 14 Sheets
feature_bullets: Warms up tired eyes with the steam hot eye mask. It heats up to around 40℃(104F). The steam and warmth relax your eyes
*Parallel import product, Japan local product, Japanese instruction
Cautions: Do not use if: 1) you have ailment or inflammation on eyes. 2) you have scars, swelling, or eczema on or around eyes.
WARNING: Do not use in microwave oven.
